definition: (of passing time) in an instant/(of a sight) in a flash
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: A depressive disorder is not the same as a passing blue mood.
sentences.chinese: 抑鬱障礙跟一晃而過的憂鬱情緒還不一樣。

sentences.english: A puzzled smile flickered across the woman's face.
sentences.chinese: 一個迷惑的微笑從這位婦女的臉上一晃而過。

sentences.english: Time passed by, and a visit made by the Chief Officer of Prisons.
sentences.chinese: 時間一晃眼就過去了，巡獄長官准備要來做一次視察。

sentences.english: The teacher flashed up each word to see if the children would recognize it.
sentences.chinese: 老師把每一個單詞舉起晃了一晃，看孩子們是否認得。

sentences.english: A genuine effort, the little boy put a bowl of food stripped bare.
sentences.chinese: 一晃眼功夫，小男孩就把一碗飯喫個精光。

sentences.english: The old man motioned with his finger.
The military inspection ends in a flash, but I am still lost in the scene.
sentences.chinese: 閱兵一晃就結束了，但我意猶未盡。

sentences.english: As the shadows pass by, a flash, then in the sight dissipated.
sentences.chinese: 就像擦肩而過的人影，一晃，便在視線中消散了。

sentences.english: 2a flash of God, a twinkling of an eye, so we vertical chuilao.
sentences.chinese: 一晃神，一轉眼，我們就這樣垂垂老去。

sentences.english: We talked and reminisced for several hours.
sentences.chinese: 我們談論着，回憶着，一晃幾個小時過去了。

sentences.english: Bill staggered on through the milky water.
sentences.chinese: 比爾在白茫茫的河水裏一搖一晃地走着。

sentences.english: He turned round and saw a shadow flit by.
sentences.chinese: 他一回頭，只見有個黑影兒一晃而過。

sentences.english: Today is about gone, if not easy to grasp the cross flashed by.
sentences.chinese: 今天即將逝去，如果不把握好橫容易一晃而過。

definition: in a flash/in the blink of an eye/to glance
in the twinkling of an eye/in a flash/to turn one's eyes
to blink/to wink/in the twinkling of an eye
(of time) to pass quickly/to be fleeting
an instant (Sanskrit: ksana)/split second/the twinkling of an eye
one instant/very short time/the twinkle of an eye
